Static (ISP) Residential Proxy Features

Fast static (ISP) residential proxies are now available for all Webshare customers.

  • Fast Residential Proxy

    Static (ISP) Residential proxies are faster alternative to standard residential proxies. With speeds up to 1Gbps, Static Residential proxies are unbeatable.

  • Unlimited Bandwidth

    Static (ISP) Residential proxies include up to unlimited bandwidth. You don't have to count how many GBs you are using to estimate your proxy pricing.

  • Global Presence

    Buy Static (ISP) Residential proxies from only well known ISPs across the world such as AT&T, Sprint and Lumen.

  • Dedicated and Static

    Dedicated Static (ISP) Residential proxies are only assigned to you. No other users use the same IP address as you. Your IP address remains static forever.

Superior performance, no limitations

With ISP Proxies, getting blocked is a rarity, as websites do not want to limit traffic coming from a well-known ASN. ISP IPs provided by premium ASNs like AT&T, Comcast, Lumen, and Frontier are built to unlock the most challenging targets with a 99.9% success rate.

  • Semi-dedicated IPs
  • Unlimited-duration sessions
  • HTTP, HTTPS, and SOCKS5 protocols
  • UDP and TCP connection

Unlimited-duration sessions and IP rotation

Choose between dynamic IP rotation and unlimited-duration sessions. You can keep an IP for as long as you need without worrying about session time.
With continuous requests, Oxylabs ISP Proxies are ideal for prolonged large-scale web scraping tasks in cybersecurity, e-commerce, market research, and ad verification.
